title: Fabrication of a novel palladium membrane sensor for its determination in environmental and biological samples
content:
Environ. Sci.: Adv., 2024, 3,776-788
DOI: 10.1039/D4VA00056K, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Adil O. S. Bahathiq, Ahmad O. Babalghith, Alaa S. Amin, Abdelrazek M. Askar
A novel sensitive, specific, and reversible optical sensor for the palladium(II) ion was created by impregnating an agarose membrane with 4-(2-amino-3-hydroxypyridine-4-ylazo)1,5-dimethyl-2-phenyl-1,2-dihydropyrazol-3-one (AHDDO).
